relics.name: Preserved Amber
relics.description: Enemies in Elite rooms lose 2 Strength at the start of combat.
relics.flavorText: Poor bug never saw it coming.

relics.name: Venomous Scales
relics.description: When attacked, apply 2 Poison to the attacker.
relics.flavorText: Eww, what's that smell?

relics.name: Yin
relics.description: Whenever you play a Skill, gain 1 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: Needed for true duality

relics.name: Cleric's Golden Helm
relics.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: It's very shiny, that's how you know its important. Suggested by Galvior.

relics.name: Filiform Needle
relics.description: At the start of each turn, apply 1 Mark to all enemies. ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.
relics.flavorText: Don't worry, I'm a professional.

relics.name: Jade Mystic Knot
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a relic, gain 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: Round and round and round it goes.

relics.name: Paper Bomb
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It goes boom. Suggested by Galvior.

relics.name: Ship's Sail
relics.description: At the start of your 4th turn, gain 22 Block.
relics.flavorText: Catches the wind. Suggested by bobjoejuan.

relics.name: Solid State Drive
relics.description: Whenever you evoke an orb, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: For the quickest boot times.

relics.name: Tactical Harness
relics.description: Whenever a card, power, or relic would add Shivs to the hand, create 1 additional Shiv.
relics.flavorText: I always wondered where she hid those knives.

relics.name: Achilles Heel Guard
relics.description: If you haven't taken damage this combat, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: It's fragile, don't let it crack.

relics.name: Blighted Snail
relics.description: At the end of each turn deal damage that increases each turn by the Fibonacci sequence (0,1,1,2,3,5,8,...).
relics.flavorText: You get lost in those smooth curves.

relics.name: Business Contract
relics.description: The Merchant's removal service can be used any number of times.
relics.flavorText: Gotta read the fine print.

relics.name: Festivus Pole
relics.description: You can now transform a card and upgrade it at rest sites.
relics.flavorText: Great strength to weight ratio.

relics.name: Horn Of Plenty
relics.description: The first rare card you play each combat is free.
relics.flavorText: The rich just keep getting richer.

relics.name: Snecko Charm
relics.description: ? rooms can now contain Elites or Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Well, good luck...

relics.name: Snecko Skin Boots
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, -1 Strength, or -1 Dexterity, chosen at random.
relics.flavorText: Poor confusing creature, now losing its skin. suggested by coledot_.

relics.name: Vampire Fang
relics.description: Whenever you play a Strike, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Sure they're fake teeth but the monsters won't know the difference.

relics.name: Circular Logic Widget
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain Bird Faced Urn, Mummfied Hand and Enchiridion. Start each combat with Master Reality, Creative AI, and Storm.
relics.flavorText: George is going insane.

relics.name: Noxious Stone
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain 2 Envenom and each monster gains 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It certainly doesn't smell great!!!!.

relics.name: Prismatic Branch
relics.description:
Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand; no restrictions.
Start each combat with Corruption and Master of Reality powers.
relics.flavorText: For the spiciest of cheese.

relics.name: Happy Flower Bed
relics.description:
You can now plant Happy Flowers at rest sites, counters will stagger.
Upon pickup, obtain one Happy Flower per defeated boss.
relics.flavorText: They all just keep on smiling.

relics.name: Relic Compass
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
All Elites gain an [additional] emerald (flaming) buff.
relics.flavorText: All the elites are on fire? Everything is fine.

relics.name: Runic Replicator
relics.description: At start of combat, choose a card in hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.
relics.flavorText: A lot of things are great when they're free.

relics.name: Comic Book
relics.description: The first colorless card you play each combat is played twice.
relics.flavorText: It's collectible.

relics.name: Dice Of Fate
relics.description: You can reroll the shop's contents once per shop.
relics.flavorText: Roll them bones.

relics.name: Fresh Water
relics.description: Upon pickup, heal 50 HP.
relics.flavorText: Always Hydrate Properly. Suggested by ezLo2.
